clearAll.message: Clear All Items in this Column

clickToPop.message: Click to pop this tab to TooManyTabs column

contactUs2.message: Problems? Bugs? Visit us here as well. We often need screenshots and your OS/Chrome version.

contactUs3.message: We welcome all constructive feedbacks in civilized languages. *wink*

copyright.message: Home | Blog | Twitter | Copyright 2010 Visibo Ltd. All rights reserved.

crossWindow3.message: Google Chrome for Mac / Linux do not support cross-window tab switching. If you try to switch to a tab in another window, that tab will be moved to the current window instead.

description.message: Manage your tabs, improve your browsing, and maintain your sanity when you have many tabs open.

disablePreviewTip.message: Tip: Even when tab previews are still loading, you can start to select or search tabs already.

exportDescription.message: Click the "Export" button to export your columns and tabs. You can save the content to a file and import it at other computers.

formatError.message: The imported content contains error! Your existing tabs are not affected. Please try to export and import again.

importDescription.message: Click the "Import" button to begin importing columns and tabs. Paste the exported text into the box, then click the "Confirm" button.

importDescription2.message: Warning: You current columns and tabs will be overwritten

importFFDescription.message: Use editor like notepad to open the backup file generated by TooManyTabs on Firefox. Click the 'Merge' button to begin importing columns and tabs. Paste the text from the file into the box, then click the 'Confirm' button.

importFFDescription2.message: Existing rows will not be replaced and rows from Firefox will be added. However, there is no 'pin' or 'color' tab functions in Chrome.

importPageTitle.message: TooManyTabs for Chrome - Import / Export Columns and Tabs

knownIssues.message: Known Issues - do not file bug-reports on these, we are communicating with Chrome team to resolve them:

knownIssues1.message: Shortcut key does not work on Chrome's own pages (e.g. default homepage, option pages).

knownIssues2.message: Chrome's own pages do not respond to TMT's wake up calls occasionally.

noResponse.message: Hm, no response from that tab. Either it is a system panel, or it's busy...

quickSupport1.message: Latest updates, tips and video tutorials here!

quickSupport2.message: We do not collect any of your private information and never send them to any servers.

recentlyClosedTip.message: Won't be cleared along with history. Can be manually cleared. Click on the icon for a sub-menu.

shortcut1.message: Use shortcut key to bring up TMT window: CTRL-

shortcut2.message: The shortcut key doesn't work when you are on system pages, like this option page. Some shortcuts may not work on certain operating systems (e.g. CTRL-A).

showTabCount.message: Show tab count on the icon:

suspendedTabsTip.message: Put your idle tabs here to reduce tab overflow. Memory will be released but forms and videos aren't saved.

welcomeMessage.message: New to TooManyTabs? Visit our welcome page.
